/* 다중 문의첨부파일 업로드 */ INSERT INTO submission_attachment ( sa_cd, sa_refer_cd, sa_orgnl_nm, sa_srvr_nm, sa_path, sa_extn, sa_size, mbr_cd, sa_reg_ymdt ) VALUES
( #{attachment.saCode}, #{attachment.saReferCode}, #{attachment.saOrgnlName}, #{attachment.saSrvrName}, #{attachment.saPath}, #{attachment.saExtn}, #{attachment.saSize}, #{attachment.mbrCode}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT sa_cd, sa_refer_cd, sa_orgnl_nm, sa_srvr_nm, sa_path, sa_extn, sa_size, mbr_cd, sa_reg_ymdt FROM submission_attachment WHERE sa_cd = #{saCode}
SELECT sa_cd, sa_refer_cd, sa_orgnl_nm, sa_srvr_nm, sa_path, sa_extn, sa_size, mbr_cd, sa_reg_ymdt FROM submission_attachment ORDER BY sa_reg_ymdt DESC
mapper.insert:
/* 자동 코드 생성 */ SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 'IQ_C1' ELSE CONCAT('IQ_C', MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(i.iq_cd, 'IQ_C', -1) AS UNSIGNED)) + 1) END AS newCode FROM inquiry i;
INSERT INTO inquiry ( iq_cd, mbr_cd, iqt_cd, iq_ttl, iq_cn, iq_secret, iq_reg_ymdt ) VALUES ( #{inquiryCode}, #{memberCode}, #{inquiryTypeCode}, #{inquiryTitle}, #{inquiryCn}, #{inquirySecret}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT iqt_cd, iqt_nm, iqt_expln, stc_cd, iqt_reg_adm_cd, iqt_reg_ymdt, iqt_mdfcn_adm_cd, iqt_mdfcn_ymdt FROM inquiry_type ORDER BY iqt_reg_ymdt;

select i.iq_cd as iq_cd, m.mbr_nm as mbr_nm, sa.sa_orgnl_nm, sa.sa_srvr_nm, sa.sa_path, sa.sa_extn, iqt.iqt_nm as iqt_nm, i.iq_ttl as iq_ttl, i.iq_cn as iq_cn, i.iq_reg_ymdt as iq_reg_ymdt, ip.iqp_ans_cn as iqp_ans_cn, ip.iqp_reg_ymdt as iqp_reg_ymdt, a.adm_cd as adm_cd, m2.mbr_nm as adm_nm from inquiry i left join submission_attachment sa on i.iq_cd = sa.sa_refer_cd inner join member m on i.mbr_cd = m.mbr_cd inner join inquiry_type iqt using (iqt_cd) left join inquiry_process ip using (iq_cd) left join admin a using (adm_cd) left join member m2 on a.mbr_cd = m2.mbr_cd WHERE i.iqt_cd = #{inquiryTypeCode} ORDER BY i.iq_reg_ymdt DESC;

select i.iq_cd as iq_cd, m.mbr_nm as mbr_nm, sa.sa_cd as sa_cd, sa.sa_orgnl_nm as sa_orgnl_nm, sa.sa_srvr_nm as sa_srvr_nm, sa.sa_path as sa_path, sa.sa_extn as sa_extn, sa.sa_size as sa_size, iqt.iqt_nm as iqt_nm, i.iq_ttl as iq_ttl, i.iq_cn as iq_cn, DATE_FORMAT(i.iq_reg_ymdt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as iq_reg_ymdt, ip.iqp_cd as iqp_cd, ip.iqp_ans_cn as iqp_ans_cn, DATE_FORMAT(ip.iqp_reg_ymdt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as iqp_reg_ymdt, a.adm_cd as adm_cd, m2.mbr_nm as adm_nm, sc.stc_cd as stc_cd, IFNULL(sc.stc_nm, '요청중') as stc_nm from inquiry i left join submission_attachment sa on i.iq_cd = sa.sa_refer_cd inner join member m on i.mbr_cd = m.mbr_cd inner join inquiry_type iqt using (iqt_cd) left join inquiry_process ip using (iq_cd) left join admin a using (adm_cd) left join member m2 on a.mbr_cd = m2.mbr_cd left join status_code sc on ip.stc_cd = sc.stc_cd where i.iq_cd = #{inquiryCode} order by m.mbr_nm desc;

SELECT i.iq_cd as iq_cd, i.iqt_cd as iqt_cd, it.iqt_nm, i.mbr_cd as mbr_cd, m.mbr_nm, i.iq_ttl as iq_ttl, i.iq_cn as iq_cn, i.iq_secret as iq_secret, i.iq_reg_ymdt as iq_reg_ymdt, it.iqt_expln as inquiryTypeExpln, it.iqt_reg_ymdt as inquiryTypeRegDate FROM inquiry i JOIN inquiry_type it ON i.iqt_cd = it.iqt_cd LEFT JOIN member m ON i.mbr_cd = m.mbr_cd LEFT JOIN admin a ON i.iq_mdfcn_adm_cd = a.adm_cd ORDER BY i.iq_reg_ymdt DESC;

SELECT i.iq_cd as iq_cd, i.iqt_cd as iqt_cd, it.iqt_nm, i.mbr_cd as mbr_cd, m.mbr_nm, i.iq_ttl as iq_ttl, i.iq_cn as iq_cn, i.iq_secret as iq_secret, i.iq_reg_ymdt as iq_reg_ymdt, it.iqt_expln as inquiryTypeExpln, it.iqt_reg_ymdt as inquiryTypeRegDate FROM inquiry i JOIN inquiry_type it ON i.iqt_cd = it.iqt_cd LEFT JOIN member m ON i.mbr_cd = m.mbr_cd LEFT JOIN admin a ON i.iq_mdfcn_adm_cd = a.adm_cd where m.mbr_cd = #{memberCode} ORDER BY i.iq_reg_ymdt DESC;
